Txt_Talk_NorudCave_B1F_MAIN_0_ACTOR_0110.Text: I'm Nordy the dwarf. What do you want with me, boy? If you've no business here, clear off!
I'm Nordy the dwarf. What do you want with me, boy? If you've no business here, clear off!
I'm Nordy the dwarf. What do you want with me, girl? If you've no business here, clear off!
I'm Nordy the dwarf. What do you want with me, girl? If you've no business here, clear off!
I'm Nordy the dwarf. What do you want with me, boy? If you've no business here, clear off!
I'm Nordy the dwarf. What do you want with me, boy? If you've no business here, clear off!
I'm Nordy the dwarf. What do you want with me, girl? If you've no business here, clear off!
I'm Nordy the dwarf. What do you want with me, girl? If you've no business here, clear off!
Hmm... So you all want to head out east, do you?
Hmm... So you want to head out east, do you?
Hmm... So you all want to head out east, do you?
Hmm... So you want to head out east, do you?
Hmph! Well, since it's by royal appointment...and he asked so very nicely...
Alright! Follow me!
Read the royal missive out loud?
{LEADER} reads the royal missive aloud...

<6>My dearest Nordy,
I hope this epistle finds you well.
<6>I most humbly request that you guide the bearer of this letter safely through the belly of the mountains.
<6><IfGender_HERO(He,She,)> is headed for Baharata on my behalf.

<6>Your constant friend and admirer,
Portogus Rex<9>
Oh, it's you again. Need something? Only thing I can really do for you is show you to the passage through to the East.
That alright with you? Then follow me!

Txt_Talk_NorudCave_B1F_MAIN_0_VOLUME_001.Text: Now, don't be misconstruing my actions, alright? I'm only doing this because the king of Portoga asked me to.
My kind have never been keen on your lot, and I'm no exception. Don't expect my help again.
Now I think of it, I did once hear of a dwarf or two that went adventuring with humans. Barmy blighters...
Right, in you go! This is the way into the passage through to the East.

Txt_Talk_NorudCave_B1F_MAIN_0_ACTOR_0110.Text: Getting to Baharata's simple: make your way out of the cave, head south-east and you'll be there soon enough.
I'm no fan of you humans, but that king of Portoga, he's different.
Honest and straightforward, he is... And he knows how to treat a dwarf. You don't get many humans like that.
